name: Again Car Drift Race 2 Lite
description:
RACE IN STYLE
Get ready for the most challenging tracks!

★★★This is lite version with 21 free tracks.
Get the Full Version on App Store to unlock all 100 Tracks!!!★★★

★100 TRACKS! Short, medium & long distance!
★4 DIFFICULTIES! Easy for kids, crazy for pros!
★Race with stylish graphic!

Simple control:
tap left/right of screen to turn
Double tap left/right of screen to drift

Each tracks can be finished in a very short time, but only the master of drifting can finish the tracks!

If you cannot complete the track, try again!

Start your engine, get ready to Turn, Drift and Fly!
